title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours and Seasons       The visitor facilities at Mount Rushmore National Memorial are open all year, seven days a week, with the exception of December 25th. On December 25th, all buildings are closed but the grounds remain open.  All times listed below are Mountain Time.  The grounds at Mount Rushmore are open the following hours:    March 12 - October 1, 2016 5:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m.   October 2, 2016 - March 11, 2017 5:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.    March 12 - September 30, 2017 5:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m.      Sculpture Illumination    May 27 - August 13, 2016 9:30 to 11:00 p.m.   August 14 - October 1, 2016 8:30 to 11:00 p.m.   October 2, 2016 - March 11, 2017 Sunset to 9:00 p.m.   March 12 - May 25, 2017 Sunset to 11:00 p.m.       Evening Lighting Ceremony    May 27 - August 13, 2016 Nightly at 9:00 p.m.   August 14 - October 1, 2016 Nightly at 8:00 p.m.   October 2, 2016 - May 25, 2017 No Evening Lighting Ceremony, but sculpture is illuminated nightly.      Operating hours for facilities are listed below:   Information Center and Lincoln Borglum Visitor Center    May 27 - August 13, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.   August 14 - October 1, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.   October 2, 2016 - May 25, 2017 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.     Sculptor's Studio    May 27 - September 3, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.    September 4 - 29, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.   September 30, 2016 Closed   October 1 - 9, 2016 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (weather permitting, subject to change)   October 10, 2016 - mid May 2017 Closed for season      Lakota, Nakota and Dakota Heritage Village    June 5 - August 13, 2017 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.     Audio Tour Building    May 8 - September 29, 2016 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.   October 1, 2016 - late May, 2017 Audio Tour rentals available in Information Center bookstore from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.     Gift Shop    May 26 - August 13, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 10:30 p.m.   August 14 - October 1, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 9:30 p.m.   October 2 - 12, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 8:30 p.m.   October 13 - 19, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.   October 20 - 26, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 7:30 p.m.   October 27 - November 2, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.   November 3 - 5, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.   November 6, 2016 - March, 2017 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.     Carvers Café    May 26 - August 13, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.   August 14 - October 1, 2016 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.   October 2, 2016 - March, 2017 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.     Ice Cream    May 26 - August 13, 2016 11:00 a.m. - 9:00 p.m.   August 14 - September 3, 2016 11:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.    September 4 - October 1, 2016 Open as staffing permits   October 2, 2016 - late May, 2017 available in Carver's Café
